about_the_game:
Sea Sniffers is a cozy diving game in which you explore the ocean with your trusty seal companion. Encounter strange creatures and exotic treasures in sunken ships or hidden caves. Discover the deep sea and all its secrets!



Step into the shoes of Kiwi, a young girl who joins the ranks of Sea Sniffers, adventurous souls who dedicate their lives to exploring the world's vast oceans. Embark on adventures with your trusty seal, Momi. Meet interesting people, witness amazing sights and discover fascinating creatures along the way.



As a Sea Sniffer, the world is your oyster. You can travel freely and dock your ship wherever you’d like.

Find a good spot and cast your rod! Directly control your seal companion to find out what secrets lie beneath the surface.



The ocean is brimming with life, and your mission is to document every single creature found within its depths. Catch them with the net, but be prepared for a struggle, they won't be caught without a fight!



Experience the sea from a whole new angle by talking with one of the ocean's many inhabitants. Some might share valuable information or clues about a hidden treasure, while others simply enjoy a friendly chat.



In the world of Maluna, where oceans stretch far and wide, every piece of land is somebody's home. Visit shops, talk to locals and help out islanders. You may even receive a reward, or learn about some spicy gossip.



Bring your discoveries to the Lumira Sea Lab. The researchers here have an endless desire for information about sea creatures, and what makes them unique. Your findings can work towards nifty upgrades for your boat and even your seal companion.




There have been reports of mysterious creatures sighted in the area. Some say they are an omen of misfortune, harbingers of unwelcome changes. Others embrace their presence, eager to find out the mystery of their origin.

Will you help uncover what these strange creatures might mean for the world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with DirectX 10.1
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
